metadata.name: Can #1
metadata.description:
Can #1

Can #1 from the "Illegal Cans" series
3000 × 3000px 1:1 PNG image
300dpi

1/1

Half of Jerusalem city is still occupied territory. The metal cans produced in Palestine cannot
count with the “one shekel” stamp, and thus they cannot be recycled. They only become wandering garbage. Flattened by car wheels, stomped by a foot, kicked by pedestrians.

When Rodrigo Imaz stumbled upon this powerful phenomenon in the city’s streets, he decided to re-present what the cans could say. In a gesture of disruptive pop transfiguration, these images became the reflection of the issue.
